summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nirvaana Wellness ERP Admin Dashboard and Reports upgrade. All 15 features tested successfully. Backend APIs (13/13 tests passed), Frontend UI flows (dashboard, reports, expenses) all working correctly.

issues: Missing dependencies in useEffect/useMemo hooks (Dashboard.jsx, Expenses.jsx, Reports.jsx) - minor warnings, not blocking functionality

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings for missing dependencies in useEffect hooks - recommend adding fetchFilteredData, fetchInitialData, etc. to dependency arrays or using useCallback
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working. Dashboard shows today's data by default. Month timeline works with Feb '26 visible on right. Reset button appears when filters are active. Reports page has Year/Month/Quarter/Property/Therapist filters. Three report boxes (Sales, Expense, P&L) open dialogs with Download Excel. Expenses page allows CRUD operations.

dashboard.month_timeline: PASS - Shows past 12 months with Feb '26 highlighted with indicator
dashboard.month_selection: PASS - Clicking Feb '26 changes to 'Feb 2026 (1st to Today)'
dashboard.reset_button: PASS - Appears when filters active, clears all selections
dashboard.stat_cards_clickable: PASS - Total Sales, GST, Customers, Services cards open detail dialogs
dashboard.pie_chart_date_label: PASS - Updates with date range label

reports.sales_report_box: PASS - Opens dialog with property breakdown and Download Excel
reports.expense_report_box: PASS - Opens dialog with recurring/adhoc breakdown
reports.pnl_report_box: PASS - Opens dialog with period and cumulative figures

expenses.add_expense_form: PASS - Property, Category, Type, Amount fields work
expenses.summary_cards: PASS - Shows Recurring, Ad-hoc, Total, Filtered totals

mocked_apis_note: WhatsApp and SMS notifications are MOCKED placeholders as per main agent context
